name: Alice and Bob Gunner
description:
Made for Brackey's 2021.1 Game Jam.

This was my first attempt at adaptive music.

-----------------------------

In the end, this was more a music-demo. I don't plan to work on more games, but I might occasionally write short "games" to demo my music.

You can find out more about me and my music projects on my website.

Or email me:itch@tomopaul.com and we'll be in touch.
